ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'International_Enquiry', ISCHANGED( Status ), NOT ( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status ) , 'Closed') ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Assigned'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Awaiting Response'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Escalated'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Pending Closure'), AND( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Closure_Code__c, 'Response Given'), ISPICKVAL( Closure_Code__c, 'Redirected') ) ) ), ISBLANK( TEXT( Priority ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Priority is required to update Status
